name: Fruit
description:
This is a brand new casual game for elimination and avoidance, with a gorgeous interface and cool special effects, bringing you a perfect gaming experience. Come and play now! Super fun collision elimination, test your intelligence, challenge your limits and brainpower! Make you more addicted and exciting as you play!

Game features:

1. Simple gameplay, extremely fast to get started, just click on it

2. A collision elimination game with a full casual flavor

3. Various levels enrich the fun of the game

Game features:

1. The game adopts directional key operation, and you need to manipulate the ball to avoid other balls and collide with blocks

2. Easy operation: It can be operated with one hand, there is no easiest way, only easier
